attributes.name: Love, Ignited
attributes.description: "Look at me, tell me that what I am feeling is not real."
attributes.parsed_description: "Look at me, tell me that what I am feeling is not real."

attributes.name: Luminous Dream
attributes.description: "Light from the moon scatters upon the ground, each fragment showing a different world."
attributes.parsed_description: "Light from the moon scatters upon the ground, each fragment showing a different world."

attributes.name: Luminous Longbow
attributes.description: "The crystals adorning the limbs shine bright even on the darkest of nights."
attributes.parsed_description: "The crystals adorning the limbs shine bright even on the darkest of nights."

attributes.name: Madman's Headhunter
attributes.description: "None are safe when the madman is on the loose."
attributes.parsed_description: "None are safe when the madman is on the loose."

attributes.name: Madman's Spellstaff
attributes.description: "Fire for everyone!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Fire for everyone!"

attributes.name: Magi's Emissary
attributes.description: "We come in peace. Do not mistake that for weakness."
attributes.parsed_description: "We come in peace. Do not mistake that for weakness."

attributes.name: Magma
attributes.description: "Molten lava spews from the head of the hatchet, dripping to the floor below it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Molten lava spews from the head of the hatchet, dripping to the floor below it."

attributes.name: Magma Core Staff
attributes.description: "The molten fire drips from the staff leaving fire in its wake."
attributes.parsed_description: "The molten fire drips from the staff leaving fire in its wake."

attributes.name: Magma Loaded Rifle
attributes.description: "My bullets will pierce your skin and you will beg for mercy."
attributes.parsed_description: "My bullets will pierce your skin and you will beg for mercy."

attributes.name: Magmaquake
attributes.description: "Thrust the spear into the ground and let loose the fires of hell."
attributes.parsed_description: "Thrust the spear into the ground and let loose the fires of hell."

attributes.name: Maker's Mark
attributes.description: "As he put the finishing touches on the blade he knew his mark was out there, waiting to be hunted."
attributes.parsed_description: "As he put the finishing touches on the blade he knew his mark was out there, waiting to be hunted."

attributes.name: Malefaction
attributes.description: "The willingness to do wrong to others is not unique to our people, but we have become very good at it all the same."
attributes.parsed_description: "The willingness to do wrong to others is not unique to our people, but we have become very good at it all the same."

attributes.name: Malevolence's Will
attributes.description: "The temple seeks the purification of Edengrove. You must see it done."
attributes.parsed_description: "The temple seeks the purification of Edengrove. You must see it done."

attributes.name: Malicious Intent
attributes.description: "The road to hell is paved with good intentions."
attributes.parsed_description: "The road to hell is paved with good intentions."

attributes.name: Malikor's Last Grasp
attributes.description: "As cold as the grave, his hands reach out to bring his enemies closer to their deaths."
attributes.parsed_description: "As cold as the grave, his hands reach out to bring his enemies closer to their deaths."

attributes.name: Malthazar's Lost Hatchet
attributes.description: "An inscription on the handle of the hatchet leads you to believe that this weapon was once possessed by the great corrupted champion Malthazar. How it ended up in your hands is something of a mystery."
attributes.parsed_description: "An inscription on the handle of the hatchet leads you to believe that this weapon was once possessed by the great corrupted champion Malthazar. How it ended up in your hands is something of a mystery."

attributes.name: Malum
attributes.description: "Unleash chaos."
attributes.parsed_description: "Unleash chaos."

attributes.name: Mammoth's Tusk
attributes.description: "The ivory of the mammoth makes for a lightweight and durable hatchet, perfect for carving up your enemies."
attributes.parsed_description: "The ivory of the mammoth makes for a lightweight and durable hatchet, perfect for carving up your enemies."

attributes.name: Mana Conduit
attributes.description: "Flowing with pure magical energy, this spear draws power from the sources around it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Flowing with pure magical energy, this spear draws power from the sources around it."

attributes.name: Manashot Blunderbuss
attributes.description: "Every shot is imbued with arcane power."
